name: Boss Battle Behemoth (Demo)
description:
First actual game this isn't for a game jam.

(NOTE: THIS IS A DEMO! THIS ISN'T FINISHED YET!)

How to play:

Use arrow keys to move

Hold [SPACE] to shoot

Press [ENTER] to go past rank screen

Plans:

40 UNIQUE BOSSES!

ACHIEVEMENTS!

SPECIAL ATTACKS!

AND MORE!
